title: Watch Face Noir
summary: A simple dark-themed watch face. Small-sized ticks, long classy hands
description: Watch Face Noir is a simple and elegant way to find out what time it is. It was made by classical guidelines and inspired by popular watch brands. Our digital century has a variety of watches but the classics will never get old. So why don't you try Noir? The hands are made in a silver color with a bit of grey shades. It is not hard to understand where they are pointing and what time it is in this exact second. There is also a small window with the current date.This is the first public version and it will be updated in future
descriptionHTML:
Watch Face Noir is a simple and elegant way to find out what time it is. It was made by classical guidelines and inspired by popular watch brands. Our digital century has a variety of watches but the classics will never get old. So why don't you try Noir? The hands are made in a silver color with a bit of grey shades. It is not hard to understand where they are pointing and what time it is in this exact second. There is also a small window with the current date.
This is the first public version and it will be updated in future
